author: bsunanda
body: This PR allows AlCaReco files for HBHEMuonFilter to keep the prereco collection for HBHE so that one can look at the RecHits before depth collapsing. It is needed for calibration studies
title: Run2-hcx145 Change o/p definition for HBHEMuonFilter AlCaReco (Backport PR #20138)
